Name: InvaderSwarm
About the game: InvaderSwarm is an old-school hardcore game. You are the pilot of a galactic ship and it's time to destroy hundreds of aliens! InvaderSwarm has 40 levels, several types of enemy ships with different behavior and weapons, 8 bosses, 4 locations. For the destruction of enemies, the player receives a currency to buy different weapons and ammunition, upgrade your warship! InvaderSwarm challenges the player at every turn. Prove yourself in a classic hardcore arcade game!
Meta Title: InvaderSwarm: Dec 16, 2020, Rex Junior and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on InvaderSwarm? Check out the release date (Dec 16, 2020), developer insights from Rex Junior, and a complete game summary.
